context.title: Changelog for Rule: HTML page language is valid
context.changelog: [{"commit":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","msg":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","date":"1569413997"},{"commit":"b233c3d2f67ebe5d52a0ad2738e61c733ae32c8c","msg":"test: spell check rules markdown body (#867)","date":"1569313606"},{"commit":"acf9b285f0349d7a7b9449627f101ce995c63f3d","msg":"Rule Update: Lang rules applicability and test cases (#822)","date":"1569279765"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"210e36973c94dfd59c7079c6fafa6a201ce6b0bc","msg":"Editorial changes (#702)","date":"1564147075"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"59456c3561ae35293c30a7d9120aa1f291a2ae91","msg":"Bugfix closing svg tag (#657)","date":"1562678603"},{"commit":"c9a3f5dd61e126b8632714dfc59718f3ab7666b8","msg":"Glossary and Rule update: Replacing \"non-empty\" definition (#430)","date":"1557910722"},{"commit":"29675dc1ac6c34cf84406b98c0079d6a50beab5f","msg":"Template update - Validity of HTML Lang attribute (#510)","date":"1557245311"},{"commit":"47bfeb4fe93e55f734bbc0ca1424e7e1b2efb543","msg":"Fix some incorrect test cases (#477)","date":"1557222024"},{"commit":"d28b6265a33a04bdaf15571065fdb269dd0b9b98","msg":"Add examples of syntactically invalid language attributes (#294)","date":"1539589228"},{"commit":"77b75c40f635e8ac612d83e9c4ef4aa883a6ddac","msg":"Fix: testcase generation (#296)","date":"1539074727"},{"commit":"8f5b2955b4c4d801c789eefdbf48f0ac93c2305c","msg":"fix: links in background were not anchors (#187)","date":"1531472363"},{"commit":"0d0c4dd473a3218d06bb8579aa40ab271719f9e2","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-lang-valid (#109)","date":"1530004020"},{"commit":"4be67b9e078db24f2b08c4dafdadcc12efe1595d","msg":"FINAL: SC3-1-1-html-has-lang (#107)","date":"1529914392"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"bf051a","name":"HTML page language is valid","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that the `lang` and `xml:lang` attributes of the root element of an HTML page have a valid primary language subtag.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:3.1.1":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"authors":["Annika Nietzio","Jey Nandakumar"]}
